PlacesOfInterest.Name: Moonpier Counting House
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A quaint banking hall where the residents of Moonvale can store their wealth and conduct business transactions.

PlacesOfInterest.Name: Harborside
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A cozy harbor-side hovel with a fireplace.

PlacesOfInterest.Name: Beacon's Rest
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A newer style home built right near the city beacon.

PlacesOfInterest.Name: Bridgeway
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A sturdy manor built on the connecting bridge between the two halves of Southport.

PlacesOfInterest.Name: Thespian's Rest
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A small apartment built specifically for the actors and performers of Southport's theater district.
